messages: Hi, I am Dia, I am here to help you~
Long time no see, time passes with the blink of the eyes...
*Hammer your chest with my kitty fist*
console: LOL, you opened the console, want to find out my little secrets?
copy: What have you copied? Remember to add the source when using it!

welcome.5_7: Good morning! The plan for a day lies in the morning, and a beautiful day is about to begin.
welcome.7_11: Good morning! How is your day doing? don't sit for too long!
welcome.11_13: It's noon, Must have being working all morning, and it's lunch time!
welcome.13_17: It's easy to get sleepy in the afternoon. Have a cup of coffee maybe?
welcome.17_19: It's evening! The sunset outside the window is beautiful.
welcome.19_21: Good evening, how are you doing today?
21_23: It's getting late, rest early, good night~
Take good care of your eyes!
welcome.24: Are you a night owl? Will you able get up tomorrow?

referrer.baidu:
Hello！Friend from Baidu search engine,
did you search 「[PLACEHOLDER]」 to find me？
referrer.so:
Hello！Friend from 360 search engine,
did you search 「[PLACEHOLDER]」 to find me？
referrer.google:
Hello！Friend from Google search engine,
enjoy your time reading 「[PLACEHOLDER]」

text: Waaaaaaaa...What are you doing? O.O
Please be gentle, I am very delicate! O.O
Sir yes sir! What can I help you with? O.O
Click to go to the home page.
Yes, click here to go back home.
Go take a look at the home page.
You want to know more about my master?
Here hides all the secrets of my master, want to take a look?
Found my master's secret hideout!
Here stores all the works my master had done！
Wanna see my master's library?
Yes, my masters' ancient histories are all here!
Click here to look at article tags.
Tags are used to better categorize your articles.

mouseover.text: You can switch between light and dark mode, click the switch to see the magic!

text: Here is a short profile of my master.
Click any of these links can teleport to my master's other worlds.
Do you want to check out the comments?
Click here will help you jump right into the comments section.
Didn't find what you are looking for? Try search it here!
You can also use ctrl/cmd + k keyboard shortcut to open the search menu.
Enjoy reading:「{text}」.
That's a good pick, enjoy time reading this article.
Hope you can learn something from:「{text}」.
Wanna write something?
Be sure write your comment carefully meow~
Anything you want to say to the author?
If you think the article is good, leave a message for the author.
Wanna write something?
Be sure write your comment carefully meow~

events.text: It's Valentine's Day，have you found your loved one in {year}?
Tell you a secret, don't trust anyone today, because today is April Fool
Today is International Labour Day，have you planned to go travel?
These few days is Christmas，my master must being shopping like crazy!
Today is New Year's Eve, this year is going away, but next year is going to be better!
